div.p: At Chetek-Weyerhaeuser Area School District, we pride ourselves on being big enough for opportunities, but small enough to care!
Chetek-Weyerhaeuser is a blend of two communities with a common goal: to prepare students for success after they walk our halls.
CWASD focuses on continuing to provide academic excellence and opportunities to students.

li.br: There are some great opportunities for youngsters to get involved in football in the coming weeks!

li.a: CWASD Continues to Meet Expectations on Latest Report Card Scores
li.br: The latest district and school report card scores have been released, and CWASD schools continue to meet the high expectations set forth by the State of Wisconsin
Here's a great article, thanks to Carl Cooley of the Chetek Alert, on Chetek's newest firefighters. They just so happen to be CWASD students!

li.a: Tech Ed Dept. Offering College-Level Courses
li.br: Here's yet another great story by Carl Cooley of The Chetek Alert! This time, he explores the high-tech courses being offered with the CWHS technical education department.

li.a: CW Using Fresh Lettuce from Local Farm

span.a: CW Using Fresh Lettuce from Local Farm
span.p: Farm-to-Table food operations have always been an important part of promoting healthy and safe eating options, and now students at Chetek-Weyerhaeuser Area School District will have an opportunity to have access to fresh, locally grown lettuce as they team up with Green Leaf Farms of Chetek.

Once again, the Chetek-Weyerhaeuser Area School District ranked as one of the highest-scoring districts in the region after receiving a rating of "Exceeds Expectations" on the state report card scores.
Take a glance at our district brochure and get started on learning more about Chetek-Weyerhaeuser Area School District!
